title: Riot not answering ticket
body:
Do i usually  get good support from riot but now they just don't  seem to care about my last ticket... i feel like its the most important one out of all the ones ive sent.
Plz help...

replies.body:
We're not trying to leave you behind! Response times can vary depending on how many others have requested support recently. I recommend sitting tight while our specialists work to get to your ticket.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Oh and is there a way to put it on somekind of high priority list? I am really scared of getting banned. Here is my ticket for more information https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/23764858

There's you no way to put you on some sort of priority since that does not exist. No player gets special treatment when they submit a support request, regardless of how much they've spent in the game or who they are. If I created a support ticket, I would have to wait in the same ticket queue, even if you poked one of our support agents about my ticket.
Ok thanks a lot for your response and im sorry i was a bit impatient...
